prompts: Create a majestic bird Pokemon that embodies the spirit of fire and has vibrant plumage.
Show me a legendary Pokemon with fiery wings and a fierce expression soaring through the skies.
I want to see a powerful Pokemon with flames dancing across its body and a strong presence.
Design a mythical creature with bright red and orange feathers, representing the essence of flame.
Generate a flying-type Pokemon that radiates warmth and has a captivating, fiery aura.
Make a Pokemon that combines beauty and power, featuring fiery colors and elegant wings.
Imagine a legendary Pokemon that commands respect with its fiery appearance and graceful flight.
